api_list.api_description: Get the latest news headlines for a topic.

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description:
Topic for which to get news headlines.

**Available topic**
- WORLD
- NATIONAL
- BUSINESS
- TECHNOLOGY
- ENTERTAINMENT
- SPORTS
- SCIENCE
- HEALTH

In addition, topic IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the *topics/* path part (e.g. Elon Musk Topic - `/topics/CAAqIggKIhxDQkFTRHdvSkwyMHZNRE51ZW1ZeEVnSmxiaWdBUAE`)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

api_list.api_description: Always returns the latest 100 articles for any `topic`, `country`, `lang`, or any of those combined

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the language of the search.  Allowed values are:
`af`, `ar`, `bg`, `bn`, `ca`,`cn`, `cs`, `cy`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `et`, `fa`, `fi`, `fr`, `gu`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `kn`, `ko`, `lt`, `lv`, `mk`, `ml`, `mr`, `ne`, `nl`, `no`, `pa`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `ru`, `sk`, `sl`, `so`, `sq`, `sv`, `sw`, `ta`, `te`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`,`tw`, `uk`, `ur`, `vi`. 
 Specifying the language will make your search more relevant

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description:
The topic to which you want to restrict the articles of your choice. This parameter is [experimental]. Accepted values are `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`,`beauty`,`travel`,`music`,`food`,`science`
- `news` usually means a general news feed (main headlines of a website).
> Important: this parameter is [experimental]. Not all news articles are assigned with a `topic`, therefore, we cannot guarantee that 100% of topics talking about technology will be assigned a `tech` label.
> One topic at a time, for example `topic=sport`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country to which you want to narrow your search. This parameter is [experimental]. We advise you to use it in conjunction with the `lang` parameter. Accepts any [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) codes

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description:
Adds to the output of the call two more variables: `media` and `media_content`

Media - the main image published with an article 

media_content  - a comma-separated string of all images used in an article

api_list.api_description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Keywords or a phrase to search for.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **business**, **entertainment**, **general**, **health**, **science**, **sports**, **technology**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (request). 20 is the default, 100 is the maximum.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **ae**, **ar**, **at**, **au**, **be**, **bg**, **br**, **ca**, **ch**, **cn**, **co**, **cu**, **cz**, **de**, **eg**, **fr**, **gb**, **gr**, **hk**, **hu**, **id**, **ie**, **il**, **in**, **it**, **jp**, **kr**, **lt**, **lv**, **ma**, **mx**, **my**, **ng**, **nl**, **no**, **nz**, **ph**, **pl**, **pt**, **ro**, **rs**, ~~ru~~, **sa**, **se**, **sg**, **si**, **sk**, **th**, **tr**, **tw**, **ua**, **us**, **ve**, **za**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

api_list.api_description:
The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content. 
Please note: You can't use AND and OR in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

api_list.api_description: Get news articles relevant for a given query.

required_parameters.name: autoCorrect

required_parameters.name: q

**Default**: `en`.

optional_parameters.description:
Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

api_list.api_description: Always returns the latest 100 articles for any `topic`, `country`, `lang`, or any of those combined

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the language of the search.  Allowed values are:
`af`, `ar`, `bg`, `bn`, `ca`,`cn`, `cs`, `cy`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `et`, `fa`, `fi`, `fr`, `gu`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `kn`, `ko`, `lt`, `lv`, `mk`, `ml`, `mr`, `ne`, `nl`, `no`, `pa`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `ru`, `sk`, `sl`, `so`, `sq`, `sv`, `sw`, `ta`, `te`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`,`tw`, `uk`, `ur`, `vi`. 
 Specifying the language will make your search more relevant

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description:
The topic to which you want to restrict the articles of your choice. This parameter is [experimental]. Accepted values are `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`,`beauty`,`travel`,`music`,`food`,`science`
- `news` usually means a general news feed (main headlines of a website).
> Important: this parameter is [experimental]. Not all news articles are assigned with a `topic`, therefore, we cannot guarantee that 100% of topics talking about technology will be assigned a `tech` label.
> One topic at a time, for example `topic=sport`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country to which you want to narrow your search. This parameter is [experimental]. We advise you to use it in conjunction with the `lang` parameter. Accepts any [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) codes

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description:
Adds to the output of the call two more variables: `media` and `media_content`

Media - the main image published with an article 

media_content  - a comma-separated string of all images used in an article

api_list.api_description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Keywords or a phrase to search for.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **business**, **entertainment**, **general**, **health**, **science**, **sports**, **technology**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (request). 20 is the default, 100 is the maximum.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **ae**, **ar**, **at**, **au**, **be**, **bg**, **br**, **ca**, **ch**, **cn**, **co**, **cu**, **cz**, **de**, **eg**, **fr**, **gb**, **gr**, **hk**, **hu**, **id**, **ie**, **il**, **in**, **it**, **jp**, **kr**, **lt**, **lv**, **ma**, **mx**, **my**, **ng**, **nl**, **no**, **nz**, **ph**, **pl**, **pt**, **ro**, **rs**, ~~ru~~, **sa**, **se**, **sg**, **si**, **sk**, **th**, **tr**, **tw**, **ua**, **us**, **ve**, **za**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

api_list.api_description:
The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content. 
Please note: You can't use AND and OR in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

api_list.api_description: Get news articles relevant for a given query.

required_parameters.name: pageSize
required_parameters.description: The number of items per page. The maximum value is 50.

required_parameters.name: autoCorrect
required_parameters.description: Automatically correct spelling.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The user's search query string.

required_parameters.name: pageNumber
required_parameters.description: The page to view.

optional_parameters.name: toPublishedDate
optional_parameters.description: The  published date and time for the newest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

optional_parameters.name: safeSearch
optional_parameters.description: A filter used to filter results for adult content.

optional_parameters.name: fromPublishedDate
optional_parameters.description: The  published date and time for the oldest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

optional_parameters.name: withThumbnails
optional_parameters.description: Show results with image thumbnails.

api_list.api_description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Keywords or a phrase to search for.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **business**, **entertainment**, **general**, **health**, **science**, **sports**, **technology**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (request). 20 is the default, 100 is the maximum.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **ae**, **ar**, **at**, **au**, **be**, **bg**, **br**, **ca**, **ch**, **cn**, **co**, **cu**, **cz**, **de**, **eg**, **fr**, **gb**, **gr**, **hk**, **hu**, **id**, **ie**, **il**, **in**, **it**, **jp**, **kr**, **lt**, **lv**, **ma**, **mx**, **my**, **ng**, **nl**, **no**, **nz**, **ph**, **pl**, **pt**, **ro**, **rs**, ~~ru~~, **sa**, **se**, **sg**, **si**, **sk**, **th**, **tr**, **tw**, **ua**, **us**, **ve**, **za**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

api_list.api_description:
The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content. 
Please note: You can't use AND and OR in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content. 
Please note: You can't use AND and OR in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

api_list.api_description: Get news articles relevant for a given query.

required_parameters.name: pageSize
required_parameters.description: The number of items per page. The maximum value is 50.

required_parameters.name: autoCorrect
required_parameters.description: Automatically correct spelling.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The user's search query string.

required_parameters.name: pageNumber
required_parameters.description: The page to view.

optional_parameters.name: toPublishedDate
optional_parameters.description: The  published date and time for the newest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

optional_parameters.name: safeSearch
optional_parameters.description: A filter used to filter results for adult content.

optional_parameters.name: fromPublishedDate
optional_parameters.description: The  published date and time for the oldest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

optional_parameters.name: withThumbnails
optional_parameters.description: Show results with image thumbnails.

query: Fetch the top political stories in Canada.

api_list.api_description: Get the latest news headlines for a topic.

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description:
Topic for which to get news headlines.

**Available topic**
- WORLD
- NATIONAL
- BUSINESS
- TECHNOLOGY
- ENTERTAINMENT
- SPORTS
- SCIENCE
- HEALTH

In addition, topic IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the *topics/* path part (e.g. Elon Musk Topic - `/topics/CAAqIggKIhxDQkFTRHdvSkwyMHZNRE51ZW1ZeEVnSmxiaWdBUAE`)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

api_list.api_description: Always returns the latest 100 articles for any `topic`, `country`, `lang`, or any of those combined

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the language of the search.  Allowed values are:
`af`, `ar`, `bg`, `bn`, `ca`,`cn`, `cs`, `cy`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `et`, `fa`, `fi`, `fr`, `gu`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `kn`, `ko`, `lt`, `lv`, `mk`, `ml`, `mr`, `ne`, `nl`, `no`, `pa`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `ru`, `sk`, `sl`, `so`, `sq`, `sv`, `sw`, `ta`, `te`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`,`tw`, `uk`, `ur`, `vi`. 
 Specifying the language will make your search more relevant

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description:
The topic to which you want to restrict the articles of your choice. This parameter is [experimental]. Accepted values are `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`,`beauty`,`travel`,`music`,`food`,`science`
- `news` usually means a general news feed (main headlines of a website).
> Important: this parameter is [experimental]. Not all news articles are assigned with a `topic`, therefore, we cannot guarantee that 100% of topics talking about technology will be assigned a `tech` label.
> One topic at a time, for example `topic=sport`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country to which you want to narrow your search. This parameter is [experimental]. We advise you to use it in conjunction with the `lang` parameter. Accepts any [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) codes

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description:
Adds to the output of the call two more variables: `media` and `media_content`

Media - the main image published with an article 

media_content  - a comma-separated string of all images used in an article

api_list.api_description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Keywords or a phrase to search for.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **business**, **entertainment**, **general**, **health**, **science**, **sports**, **technology**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (request). 20 is the default, 100 is the maximum.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **ae**, **ar**, **at**, **au**, **be**, **bg**, **br**, **ca**, **ch**, **cn**, **co**, **cu**, **cz**, **de**, **eg**, **fr**, **gb**, **gr**, **hk**, **hu**, **id**, **ie**, **il**, **in**, **it**, **jp**, **kr**, **lt**, **lv**, **ma**, **mx**, **my**, **ng**, **nl**, **no**, **nz**, **ph**, **pl**, **pt**, **ro**, **rs**, ~~ru~~, **sa**, **se**, **sg**, **si**, **sk**, **th**, **tr**, **tw**, **ua**, **us**, **ve**, **za**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

api_list.api_description:
The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

optional_parameters.name: q

Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content.

optional_parameters.name: domain

api_list.api_description: Get the latest news headlines for a topic.

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description:
Topic for which to get news headlines.

**Available topic**
- WORLD
- NATIONAL
- BUSINESS
- TECHNOLOGY
- ENTERTAINMENT
- SPORTS
- SCIENCE
- HEALTH

In addition, topic IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the *topics/* path part (e.g. Elon Musk Topic - `/topics/CAAqIggKIhxDQkFTRHdvSkwyMHZNRE51ZW1ZeEVnSmxiaWdBUAE`)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

api_list.api_description: Always returns the latest 100 articles for any `topic`, `country`, `lang`, or any of those combined

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the language of the search.  Allowed values are:
`af`, `ar`, `bg`, `bn`, `ca`,`cn`, `cs`, `cy`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `et`, `fa`, `fi`, `fr`, `gu`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `kn`, `ko`, `lt`, `lv`, `mk`, `ml`, `mr`, `ne`, `nl`, `no`, `pa`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `ru`, `sk`, `sl`, `so`, `sq`, `sv`, `sw`, `ta`, `te`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`,`tw`, `uk`, `ur`, `vi`. 
 Specifying the language will make your search more relevant

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description:
The topic to which you want to restrict the articles of your choice. This parameter is [experimental]. Accepted values are `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`,`beauty`,`travel`,`music`,`food`,`science`
- `news` usually means a general news feed (main headlines of a website).
> Important: this parameter is [experimental]. Not all news articles are assigned with a `topic`, therefore, we cannot guarantee that 100% of topics talking about technology will be assigned a `tech` label.
> One topic at a time, for example `topic=sport`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country to which you want to narrow your search. This parameter is [experimental]. We advise you to use it in conjunction with the `lang` parameter. Accepts any [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) codes

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description:
Adds to the output of the call two more variables: `media` and `media_content`

Media - the main image published with an article 

media_content  - a comma-separated string of all images used in an article

api_list.api_description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

optional_parameters.name: q

optional_parameters.name: category

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (request). 20 is the default, 100 is the maximum.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

api_list.api_description: Always returns the latest 100 articles for any `topic`, `country`, `lang`, or any of those combined

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the language of the search.  Allowed values are:
`af`, `ar`, `bg`, `bn`, `ca`,`cn`, `cs`, `cy`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `et`, `fa`, `fi`, `fr`, `gu`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `kn`, `ko`, `lt`, `lv`, `mk`, `ml`, `mr`, `ne`, `nl`, `no`, `pa`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `ru`, `sk`, `sl`, `so`, `sq`, `sv`, `sw`, `ta`, `te`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`,`tw`, `uk`, `ur`, `vi`. 
 Specifying the language will make your search more relevant

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description:
The topic to which you want to restrict the articles of your choice. This parameter is [experimental]. Accepted values are `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`,`beauty`,`travel`,`music`,`food`,`science`
- `news` usually means a general news feed (main headlines of a website).
> Important: this parameter is [experimental]. Not all news articles are assigned with a `topic`, therefore, we cannot guarantee that 100% of topics talking about technology will be assigned a `tech` label.
> One topic at a time, for example `topic=sport`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country to which you want to narrow your search. This parameter is [experimental]. We advise you to use it in conjunction with the `lang` parameter. Accepts any [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) codes

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description:
Adds to the output of the call two more variables: `media` and `media_content`

Media - the main image published with an article 

media_content  - a comma-separated string of all images used in an article

api_list.api_description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Keywords or a phrase to search for.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **business**, **entertainment**, **general**, **health**, **science**, **sports**, **technology**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (request). 20 is the default, 100 is the maximum.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **ae**, **ar**, **at**, **au**, **be**, **bg**, **br**, **ca**, **ch**, **cn**, **co**, **cu**, **cz**, **de**, **eg**, **fr**, **gb**, **gr**, **hk**, **hu**, **id**, **ie**, **il**, **in**, **it**, **jp**, **kr**, **lt**, **lv**, **ma**, **mx**, **my**, **ng**, **nl**, **no**, **nz**, **ph**, **pl**, **pt**, **ro**, **rs**, ~~ru~~, **sa**, **se**, **sg**, **si**, **sk**, **th**, **tr**, **tw**, **ua**, **us**, **ve**, **za**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

api_list.api_description:
The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content. 
Please note: You can't use AND and OR in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

api_list.api_description: Get news articles relevant for a given query.

required_parameters.name: pageSize
required_parameters.description: The number of items per page. The maximum value is 50.

required_parameters.name: autoCorrect
required_parameters.description: Automatically correct spelling.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The user's search query string.

required_parameters.name: pageNumber
required_parameters.description: The page to view.

optional_parameters.name: toPublishedDate
optional_parameters.description: The  published date and time for the newest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

optional_parameters.name: safeSearch
optional_parameters.description: A filter used to filter results for adult content.

optional_parameters.name: fromPublishedDate
optional_parameters.description: The  published date and time for the oldest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

optional_parameters.name: withThumbnails
optional_parameters.description: Show results with image thumbnails.

api_list.api_description: Get the latest news headlines for a topic.

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description:
Topic for which to get news headlines.

**Available topic**
- WORLD
- NATIONAL
- BUSINESS
- TECHNOLOGY
- ENTERTAINMENT
- SPORTS
- SCIENCE
- HEALTH

In addition, topic IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the *topics/* path part (e.g. Elon Musk Topic - `/topics/CAAqIggKIhxDQkFTRHdvSkwyMHZNRE51ZW1ZeEVnSmxiaWdBUAE`)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

api_list.api_description: Always returns the latest 100 articles for any `topic`, `country`, `lang`, or any of those combined

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the language of the search.  Allowed values are:
`af`, `ar`, `bg`, `bn`, `ca`,`cn`, `cs`, `cy`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `et`, `fa`, `fi`, `fr`, `gu`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `kn`, `ko`, `lt`, `lv`, `mk`, `ml`, `mr`, `ne`, `nl`, `no`, `pa`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `ru`, `sk`, `sl`, `so`, `sq`, `sv`, `sw`, `ta`, `te`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`,`tw`, `uk`, `ur`, `vi`. 
 Specifying the language will make your search more relevant

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description:
The topic to which you want to restrict the articles of your choice. This parameter is [experimental]. Accepted values are `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`,`beauty`,`travel`,`music`,`food`,`science`
- `news` usually means a general news feed (main headlines of a website).
> Important: this parameter is [experimental]. Not all news articles are assigned with a `topic`, therefore, we cannot guarantee that 100% of topics talking about technology will be assigned a `tech` label.
> One topic at a time, for example `topic=sport`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country to which you want to narrow your search. This parameter is [experimental]. We advise you to use it in conjunction with the `lang` parameter. Accepts any [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) codes

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description:

Media - the main image published with an article 

media_content  - a comma-separated string of all images used in an article

api_list.api_description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Keywords or a phrase to search for.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **business**, **entertainment**, **general**, **health**, **science**, **sports**, **technology**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (request). 20 is the default, 100 is the maximum.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **ae**, **ar**, **at**, **au**, **be**, **bg**, **br**, **ca**, **ch**, **cn**, **co**, **cu**, **cz**, **de**, **eg**, **fr**, **gb**, **gr**, **hk**, **hu**, **id**, **ie**, **il**, **in**, **it**, **jp**, **kr**, **lt**, **lv**, **ma**, **mx**, **my**, **ng**, **nl**, **no**, **nz**, **ph**, **pl**, **pt**, **ro**, **rs**, ~~ru~~, **sa**, **se**, **sg**, **si**, **sk**, **th**, **tr**, **tw**, **ua**, **us**, **ve**, **za**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

api_list.api_description:
The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content. 
Please note: You can't use AND and OR in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description:
Topic for which to get news headlines.

**Available topic**
- WORLD
- NATIONAL
- BUSINESS
- TECHNOLOGY
- ENTERTAINMENT
- SPORTS
- SCIENCE
- HEALTH

In addition, topic IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the *topics/* path part (e.g. Elon Musk Topic - `/topics/CAAqIggKIhxDQkFTRHdvSkwyMHZNRE51ZW1ZeEVnSmxiaWdBUAE`)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

api_list.api_description: Always returns the latest 100 articles for any `topic`, `country`, `lang`, or any of those combined

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the language of the search.  Allowed values are:
`af`, `ar`, `bg`, `bn`, `ca`,`cn`, `cs`, `cy`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `et`, `fa`, `fi`, `fr`, `gu`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `kn`, `ko`, `lt`, `lv`, `mk`, `ml`, `mr`, `ne`, `nl`, `no`, `pa`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `ru`, `sk`, `sl`, `so`, `sq`, `sv`, `sw`, `ta`, `te`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`,`tw`, `uk`, `ur`, `vi`. 
 Specifying the language will make your search more relevant

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description:
The topic to which you want to restrict the articles of your choice. This parameter is [experimental]. Accepted values are `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`,`beauty`,`travel`,`music`,`food`,`science`
- `news` usually means a general news feed (main headlines of a website).
> Important: this parameter is [experimental]. Not all news articles are assigned with a `topic`, therefore, we cannot guarantee that 100% of topics talking about technology will be assigned a `tech` label.

media_content  - a comma-separated string of all images used in an article

api_list.api_description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Keywords or a phrase to search for.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **business**, **entertainment**, **general**, **health**, **science**, **sports**, **technology**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (request). 20 is the default, 100 is the maximum.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **ae**, **ar**, **at**, **au**, **be**, **bg**, **br**, **ca**, **ch**, **cn**, **co**, **cu**, **cz**, **de**, **eg**, **fr**, **gb**, **gr**, **hk**, **hu**, **id**, **ie**, **il**, **in**, **it**, **jp**, **kr**, **lt**, **lv**, **ma**, **mx**, **my**, **ng**, **nl**, **no**, **nz**, **ph**, **pl**, **pt**, **ro**, **rs**, ~~ru~~, **sa**, **se**, **sg**, **si**, **sk**, **th**, **tr**, **tw**, **ua**, **us**, **ve**, **za**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language

optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content. 
Please note: You can't use AND and OR in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

api_list.api_description: Get the latest news headlines for a topic.

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description:
Topic for which to get news headlines.

**Available topic**
- WORLD
- NATIONAL
- BUSINESS
- TECHNOLOGY
- ENTERTAINMENT
- SPORTS
- SCIENCE
- HEALTH

In addition, topic IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the *topics/* path part (e.g. Elon Musk Topic - `/topics/CAAqIggKIhxDQkFTRHdvSkwyMHZNRE51ZW1ZeEVnSmxiaWdBUAE`)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

api_list.api_description: Always returns the latest 100 articles for any `topic`, `country`, `lang`, or any of those combined

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the language of the search.  Allowed values are:
`af`, `ar`, `bg`, `bn`, `ca`,`cn`, `cs`, `cy`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `et`, `fa`, `fi`, `fr`, `gu`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `kn`, `ko`, `lt`, `lv`, `mk`, `ml`, `mr`, `ne`, `nl`, `no`, `pa`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `ru`, `sk`, `sl`, `so`, `sq`, `sv`, `sw`, `ta`, `te`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`,`tw`, `uk`, `ur`, `vi`. 
 Specifying the language will make your search more relevant

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description:
The topic to which you want to restrict the articles of your choice. This parameter is [experimental]. Accepted values are `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`,`beauty`,`travel`,`music`,`food`,`science`
- `news` usually means a general news feed (main headlines of a website).
> Important: this parameter is [experimental]. Not all news articles are assigned with a `topic`, therefore, we cannot guarantee that 100% of topics talking about technology will be assigned a `tech` label.
> One topic at a time, for example `topic=sport`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country to which you want to narrow your search. This parameter is [experimental]. We advise you to use it in conjunction with the `lang` parameter. Accepts any [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) codes

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description:
Adds to the output of the call two more variables: `media` and `media_content`

Media - the main image published with an article 

media_content  - a comma-separated string of all images used in an article

api_list.api_description:
The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

api_list.api_description: Get the latest news headlines for a topic.

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description:
Topic for which to get news headlines.

**Available topic**
- WORLD
- NATIONAL
- BUSINESS
- TECHNOLOGY
- ENTERTAINMENT
- SPORTS
- SCIENCE
- HEALTH

In addition, topic IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the *topics/* path part (e.g. Elon Musk Topic - `/topics/CAAqIggKIhxDQkFTRHdvSkwyMHZNRE51ZW1ZeEVnSmxiaWdBUAE`)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

api_list.api_description: Always returns the latest 100 articles for any `topic`, `country`, `lang`, or any of those combined

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the language of the search.  Allowed values are:
`af`, `ar`, `bg`, `bn`, `ca`,`cn`, `cs`, `cy`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `et`, `fa`, `fi`, `fr`, `gu`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `kn`, `ko`, `lt`, `lv`, `mk`, `ml`, `mr`, `ne`, `nl`, `no`, `pa`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `ru`, `sk`, `sl`, `so`, `sq`, `sv`, `sw`, `ta`, `te`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`,`tw`, `uk`, `ur`, `vi`. 
 Specifying the language will make your search more relevant

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description:
The topic to which you want to restrict the articles of your choice. This parameter is [experimental]. Accepted values are `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`,`beauty`,`travel`,`music`,`food`,`science`
- `news` usually means a general news feed (main headlines of a website).
> Important: this parameter is [experimental]. Not all news articles are assigned with a `topic`, therefore, we cannot guarantee that 100% of topics talking about technology will be assigned a `tech` label.
> One topic at a time, for example `topic=sport`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country to which you want to narrow your search. This parameter is [experimental]. We advise you to use it in conjunction with the `lang` parameter. Accepts any [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) codes

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description:
Adds to the output of the call two more variables: `media` and `media_content`

Media - the main image published with an article 

media_content  - a comma-separated string of all images used in an article

Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

api_list.api_description: Always returns the latest 100 articles for any `topic`, `country`, `lang`, or any of those combined

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the language of the search.  Allowed values are:
`af`, `ar`, `bg`, `bn`, `ca`,`cn`, `cs`, `cy`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `et`, `fa`, `fi`, `fr`, `gu`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `kn`, `ko`, `lt`, `lv`, `mk`, `ml`, `mr`, `ne`, `nl`, `no`, `pa`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `ru`, `sk`, `sl`, `so`, `sq`, `sv`, `sw`, `ta`, `te`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`,`tw`, `uk`, `ur`, `vi`. 
 Specifying the language will make your search more relevant

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description:
The topic to which you want to restrict the articles of your choice. This parameter is [experimental]. Accepted values are `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`,`beauty`,`travel`,`music`,`food`,`science`
- `news` usually means a general news feed (main headlines of a website).
> Important: this parameter is [experimental]. Not all news articles are assigned with a `topic`, therefore, we cannot guarantee that 100% of topics talking about technology will be assigned a `tech` label.
> One topic at a time, for example `topic=sport`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country to which you want to narrow your search. This parameter is [experimental]. We advise you to use it in conjunction with the `lang` parameter. Accepts any [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) codes

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description:
Adds to the output of the call two more variables: `media` and `media_content`

Media - the main image published with an article 

media_content  - a comma-separated string of all images used in an article

api_list.api_description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Keywords or a phrase to search for.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **business**, **entertainment**, **general**, **health**, **science**, **sports**, **technology**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (request). 20 is the default, 100 is the maximum.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **ae**, **ar**, **at**, **au**, **be**, **bg**, **br**, **ca**, **ch**, **cn**, **co**, **cu**, **cz**, **de**, **eg**, **fr**, **gb**, **gr**, **hk**, **hu**, **id**, **ie**, **il**, **in**, **it**, **jp**, **kr**, **lt**, **lv**, **ma**, **mx**, **my**, **ng**, **nl**, **no**, **nz**, **ph**, **pl**, **pt**, **ro**, **rs**, ~~ru~~, **sa**, **se**, **sg**, **si**, **sk**, **th**, **tr**, **tw**, **ua**, **us**, **ve**, **za**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

api_list.api_description:
The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content. 
Please note: You can't use AND and OR in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

api_list.api_description: Get news articles relevant for a given query.

required_parameters.name: pageSize
required_parameters.description: The number of items per page. The maximum value is 50.

required_parameters.name: autoCorrect
required_parameters.description: Automatically correct spelling.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The user's search query string.

required_parameters.name: pageNumber
required_parameters.description: The page to view.

optional_parameters.name: toPublishedDate
optional_parameters.description: The  published date and time for the newest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

optional_parameters.name: safeSearch
optional_parameters.description: A filter used to filter results for adult content.

optional_parameters.name: fromPublishedDate
optional_parameters.description: The  published date and time for the oldest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

optional_parameters.name: withThumbnails
optional_parameters.description: Show results with image thumbnails.

api_list.api_description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Keywords or a phrase to search for.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **business**, **entertainment**, **general**, **health**, **science**, **sports**, **technology**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (request). 20 is the default, 100 is the maximum.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **ae**, **ar**, **at**, **au**, **be**, **bg**, **br**, **ca**, **ch**, **cn**, **co**, **cu**, **cz**, **de**, **eg**, **fr**, **gb**, **gr**, **hk**, **hu**, **id**, **ie**, **il**, **in**, **it**, **jp**, **kr**, **lt**, **lv**, **ma**, **mx**, **my**, **ng**, **nl**, **no**, **nz**, **ph**, **pl**, **pt**, **ro**, **rs**, ~~ru~~, **sa**, **se**, **sg**, **si**, **sk**, **th**, **tr**, **tw**, **ua**, **us**, **ve**, **za**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

api_list.api_description:
The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content. 
Please note: You can't use AND and OR in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content. 
Please note: You can't use AND and OR in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

api_list.api_description: Get news articles relevant for a given query.

required_parameters.name: pageSize
required_parameters.description: The number of items per page. The maximum value is 50.

required_parameters.name: autoCorrect
required_parameters.description: Automatically correct spelling.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The user's search query string.

required_parameters.name: pageNumber
required_parameters.description: The page to view.

optional_parameters.name: toPublishedDate
optional_parameters.description: The  published date and time for the newest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

optional_parameters.name: safeSearch
optional_parameters.description: A filter used to filter results for adult content.

optional_parameters.name: fromPublishedDate
optional_parameters.description: The  published date and time for the oldest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

optional_parameters.name: withThumbnails
optional_parameters.description: Show results with image thumbnails.

query: Fetch the latest health headlines for Brazil.

api_list.api_description: Get the latest news headlines for a topic.

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description:
Topic for which to get news headlines.

**Available topic**
- WORLD
- NATIONAL
- BUSINESS
- TECHNOLOGY
- ENTERTAINMENT
- SPORTS
- SCIENCE
- HEALTH

In addition, topic IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the *topics/* path part (e.g. Elon Musk Topic - `/topics/CAAqIggKIhxDQkFTRHdvSkwyMHZNRE51ZW1ZeEVnSmxiaWdBUAE`)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

api_list.api_description: Always returns the latest 100 articles for any `topic`, `country`, `lang`, or any of those combined

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the language of the search.  Allowed values are:
`af`, `ar`, `bg`, `bn`, `ca`,`cn`, `cs`, `cy`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `et`, `fa`, `fi`, `fr`, `gu`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `kn`, `ko`, `lt`, `lv`, `mk`, `ml`, `mr`, `ne`, `nl`, `no`, `pa`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `ru`, `sk`, `sl`, `so`, `sq`, `sv`, `sw`, `ta`, `te`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`,`tw`, `uk`, `ur`, `vi`. 
 Specifying the language will make your search more relevant

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description:
The topic to which you want to restrict the articles of your choice. This parameter is [experimental]. Accepted values are `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`,`beauty`,`travel`,`music`,`food`,`science`
- `news` usually means a general news feed (main headlines of a website).
> Important: this parameter is [experimental]. Not all news articles are assigned with a `topic`, therefore, we cannot guarantee that 100% of topics talking about technology will be assigned a `tech` label.
> One topic at a time, for example `topic=sport`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country to which you want to narrow your search. This parameter is [experimental]. We advise you to use it in conjunction with the `lang` parameter. Accepts any [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) codes

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description:
Adds to the output of the call two more variables: `media` and `media_content`

Media - the main image published with an article 

media_content  - a comma-separated string of all images used in an article

api_list.api_description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Keywords or a phrase to search for.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **business**, **entertainment**, **general**, **health**, **science**, **sports**, **technology**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (request). 20 is the default, 100 is the maximum.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Possible options: **ae**, **ar**, **at**, **au**, **be**, **bg**, **br**, **ca**, **ch**, **cn**, **co**, **cu**, **cz**, **de**, **eg**, **fr**, **gb**, **gr**, **hk**, **hu**, **id**, **ie**, **il**, **in**, **it**, **jp**, **kr**, **lt**, **lv**, **ma**, **mx**, **my**, **ng**, **nl**, **no**, **nz**, **ph**, **pl**, **pt**, **ro**, **rs**, ~~ru~~, **sa**, **se**, **sg**, **si**, **sk**, **th**, **tr**, **tw**, **ua**, **us**, **ve**, **za**. Note: you can't mix this param with the sources param.

api_list.api_description:
The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

optional_parameters.name: qintitle
optional_parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

optional_parameters.name: q

Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content.

optional_parameters.name: domain

api_list.api_description: Get the latest news headlines for a topic.

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description:
Topic for which to get news headlines.

**Available topic**
- WORLD
- NATIONAL
- BUSINESS
- TECHNOLOGY
- ENTERTAINMENT
- SPORTS
- SCIENCE
- HEALTH

In addition, topic IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the *topics/* path part (e.g. Elon Musk Topic - `/topics/CAAqIggKIhxDQkFTRHdvSkwyMHZNRE51ZW1ZeEVnSmxiaWdBUAE`)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `US`.

api_list.api_description: Always returns the latest 100 articles for any `topic`, `country`, `lang`, or any of those combined

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the language of the search.  Allowed values are:
`af`, `ar`, `bg`, `bn`, `ca`,`cn`, `cs`, `cy`, `da`, `de`, `el`, `en`, `es`, `et`, `fa`, `fi`, `fr`, `gu`, `he`, `hi`, `hr`, `hu`, `id`, `it`, `ja`, `kn`, `ko`, `lt`, `lv`, `mk`, `ml`, `mr`, `ne`, `nl`, `no`, `pa`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `ru`, `sk`, `sl`, `so`, `sq`, `sv`, `sw`, `ta`, `te`, `th`, `tl`, `tr`,`tw`, `uk`, `ur`, `vi`. 
 Specifying the language will make your search more relevant

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description:
The topic to which you want to restrict the articles of your choice. This parameter is [experimental]. Accepted values are `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`,`beauty`,`travel`,`music`,`food`,`science`
- `news` usually means a general news feed (main headlines of a website).
> Important: this parameter is [experimental]. Not all news articles are assigned with a `topic`, therefore, we cannot guarantee that 100% of topics talking about technology will be assigned a `tech` label.
> One topic at a time, for example `topic=sport`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country to which you want to narrow your search. This parameter is [experimental]. We advise you to use it in conjunction with the `lang` parameter. Accepts any [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) codes

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description:
Adds to the output of the call two more variables: `media` and `media_content`

Media - the main image published with an article 

media_content  - a comma-separated string of all images used in an article
